title: The Onyx
description: Tom Bridger, America's first billionaire, lusted after two things; the power over his country's destiny, and the woman he could never marry.He wanted them both no matter what the price. When he was bitterly poor, Tom had loved the exquisite Antonia and lost his only chance to claim her. He would never stop loving her, and when he had gained immense wealth and changed the world, it was their son who wold return, intent on destroying Tom's colossal empire, the empire he had sacrificed everything to build.
author: Jacqueline Briskin
